components.name: YEL insurance requirement
components.description: Conditions that trigger mandatory insurance

components.name: age requirement
components.description: Entrepreneur must be 18-68 years old

components.name: business activity requirement
components.description: Entrepreneur must work in their company

components.name: duration requirement
components.description: Business operations must last at least 4 months

components.name: income threshold
components.description: Minimum earned income of 9,423.09 € per year (2026)

components.name: earned income calculation
components.description: Estimate of salary for equally skilled person doing same work

components.name: social security foundation
components.description: Base for all social security benefits

components.description: Kela calculates benefits based on YEL income

components.name: earnings-related daily allowance
components.description: Higher benefit threshold of 15,481 € annual income

components.name: tax deduction
components.description: YEL fees are fully tax-deductible

components.name: new entrepreneur discount
components.description: 22% discount on fees for first 4 years (48 months)

components.name: income supervision
components.description: Pension institutions check earned income every 3 years

components.name: insurance coverage
components.description: Protection in unexpected life situations

constraints.description: YEL insurance is mandatory for entrepreneurs aged 18-68
Business operations must last at least 4 months
Annual earned income must be at least 9,423.09 € (2026)
To receive earnings-related daily allowance, annual income must be at least 15,481 €
Insurance applies to work in business name, general partnership, limited partnership, or as shareholder in Ltd
New entrepreneurs receive 22% discount on fees for first 4 years
Pension institutions check earned income every 3 years
Don't underreport earned income to save on fees
Underreporting income weakens protection in unexpected life situations

metadata.title: Guide: Entrepreneur's Pension Insurance (YEL)
metadata.description: Information about YEL insurance requirements, benefits, and income calculations for entrepreneurs
